name: @google-cloud/recaptcha-akamai
description: A reCAPTCHA Enterprise Typescript Libarary for Akamai Edge Workers.
author: reCAPTCHA Team <recaptcha-enterprise-support@google.com>

scripts.build: node esbuild.config.js && mv dist/edge_worker.js dist/main.js && cp src/bundle.json dist/
scripts.pack: mkdir pkg && cd dist && tar -czvf akamai.tgz bundle.json main.js && mv akamai.tgz ../pkg/akamai_client.tar.gz
scripts.devclean: rm -rf node_nodules && rm -rf dist && rm -rf pkg && rm package-lock.json
